General.Name: Novavis Group SA
General.Description: Novavis Group S.A. engages in developing, designing, and executing renewable energy sources projects in Poland. It focuses on photovoltaic installation projects. The company was formerly known as Rubicon Partners S.A. and changed its name to Novavis Group S.A. in September 2020. Novavis Group S.A. is based in Warsaw, Poland.

2.Name: Mr. Grzegorz  Pilch
2.Title: Sec. & Member of the Supervisory Board
